==Useful Info==
'''Terence the Incautious''' is a fairly weak [[unique]] [[human (monster)|human]] fighter, likely one of the first uniques you will encounter and much less deadly than [[Sigmund]]. He occasionally generates with a [[wand]], and has a 1% chance of spawning with [[Throatcutter]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:2-3

==Tips & Tricks==
*Like most things in ''Crawl'', try not to be overconfident. For a character arriving on D:2, a few bad damage rolls can spell death. If you decide to fight, make sure to have full HP first. 
*Thankfully, [[Throatcutter]]'s instant kill effect does not affect the player.

==History==
*In [[0.29]], Terence became a much greater threat to new characters, as [[pillar dancing]] no longer works.
*In [[0.28]], Terence gained a small chance to spawn with Throatcutter.
